meanings.sent1: The teacher had to address the misbehaviors of the students during class.
meanings.sent2: Parents should guide their children on how to avoid misbehaviors in public.
meanings.sent3: The misbehaviors of the puppy made everyone laugh at the park.
meanings.sent4: The misbehaviors of the storm could be seen in the destruction it left behind.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of his misbehaviors were clear when he had to apologize to his friends.

meanings.definition: Actions that are not socially acceptable or appropriate
meanings.sent1: The school has strict rules against misbehaviors like bullying and cheating.
meanings.sent2: The misbehaviors of the guest at the party caused discomfort among the other attendees.
meanings.sent3: His misbehaviors at the dinner table were met with disapproving glances from his parents.
meanings.sent4: The misbehaviors of the car engine indicated a need for immediate repair.
meanings.sent5: The misbehaviors of the computer system led to a complete shutdown of operations.
